column5: On my way to Lakair....   Just got back from Avery's grad... He recieved two awards...  top class mark in Science and top class mark in Information Technology....  ('puters to me.. i guess...)  Any how if ya see him at Lakair, congratulate him!!!  I'm pretty proud of the boy!!  and away I go!!!
See you tomorrow!  Looking forward to seeing you and the family again.
Gives you a good feeling when the kids get those awards.
See you sometime early Sat. morning.  I'll make sure to congratulate Avery for sure.  What an accomplishment.  Joey

not gonna be there, but congrats to avery!!!  that is great news.  As a teacher i sure can respect a student that works hard and achieves such awards.  good job again avery.  have fun at lakair, sounds like you have worked hard and deserve a good vacation.  jason
